links.description: The South African-born billionaire businessman and engineer Elon Musk is one of the world's leading innovators in space travel. links.title: The Organized, Varied, & Outright Crazy Attacks On Tesla
links.description: Tesla has been attacked for years. Certain people have targeted Tesla as an entity to smear essentially since Day 1. The reasons vary - pure entertainment, efforts to block competition, envy, masculinity issues, entrenched insider inertia, etc. Some people also just think Tesla, its products, and its CEO are not as cool as the rest of the world thinks.
